title: The Madagascar palm genome provides new insights on the evolution of Apocynaceae specialized metabolism
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Clément Cuello, Hans J. Jansen, Cécile Abdallah, Duchesse-Lacours Zamar Mbadinga, Caroline Birer Williams, Mickael Durand, Audrey Oudin, Nicolas Papon, Nathalie Giglioli-Guivarc'h, Ron P. Dirks, Michael Krogh Jensen, Sarah Ellen O'Connor, Sébastien Besseau, Vincent Courdavault
